channel.title: fish on Travis Brady
channel.description: Recent content in fish on Travis Brady

item.title: Moving from Zsh to Fish
item.description: Moving from Zsh to Fish üê† I recently began experimenting with Fish after a long time using zsh and oh my zsh. Thus far it’s been a good experience so thought I’d share why I did it, how I tweaked my setup and my thoughts on Fish so far. I also share some of the many mistakes I made in trying to configure fish to behave a bit like a faster zsh.
